author: mmusich
body:
As foreseen in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/22134#issuecomment-366654833, since in #22134 `SiStripQualityStatistics` has been migrated to be a `DQMEDAnalyzer` in lieu of a `edm::EDAnalyzer ` the current configuration declaration all over CMSSW won't work anymore (after #22319),  due to a Framework type mismatch: 
```
----- Begin Fatal Exception 08-Mar-2018 12:12:51 CET-----------------------
An exception of category 'Configuration' occurred while
   [0] Constructing the EventProcessor
   [1] Validating configuration of module: class=SiStripQualityStatistics label='stat'
Exception Message:
The base type in the python configuration is EDAnalyzer, but the base type
for the module's C++ class is EDProducer. Please fix the configuration.
It must use the same base type as the C++ class.
----- End Fatal Exception -------------------------------------------------

```
I profit of this PR to add a unit test for the `SiStripQualityStatistics`  that shall help us to catch misbehaviors in time.
title: [10.1.X] Migrate SiStripQualityStatistics configuration to be a DQMEDAnalyzer
